evidence.claim: MyDirectives utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure and application deployment.
The company processes health information in compliance with HIPAA guidelines, indicating a focus on health-tech and secure data handling.
MyDirectives supports interoperability standards like FHIR and HL7 for data management in healthcare.
The use of EDI and X12 transaction sets for insurance claims processing is highlighted in their documentation.
MyDirectives has recognized integration patterns that align with common healthcare data exchange practices.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 in health tech; fits within target size for API-first healthcare solutions.
